author: Leo Robitschek
description: Beautifully balanced bitter-sweetness with tequila and mezcal sitting harmoniously with cherry and aperitivo liqueurs, with lemon freshness. A perfect aperitivo cocktail.
name: Eclipse Cocktail (by Leo Robitschek)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
FLOAT mezcal on surface of drink
